The Dragon God Crystal Statue increases weekly creature production by 50%, provides 5000 extra gold per day, increases the damage of all four magic schools by 50% for all allied heroes, and grants +1 speed and +2 morale to all dragon-type creatures in their army.

The Life Dragon Nest increases the weekly production of Firewing Dragon Hatchlings by 4.

faction.dragonutopiaks-town.dragonutopia:
{Dragon Kingdom}
Alignment: Neutral, Lawful
Native Terrain: Highlands
Location: Entagre Continent – Dragon Kingdom
(In progress).
hero.dragonutopiaks-town.dragoneMoonWatc: Mochizuki Narukami has been naturally fluent in Draconic since birth. Throughout his long career of adventure, he has tirelessly pushed his abilities to the limit: communicating with dragons from all over the world and successfully persuading them to form a force on the continent of Entagre that cannot be ignored—the Dragon Kingdom. His excellent leadership has made the dragons of this kingdom willing to follow his commands, thus building a highly cohesive army.
The hero can perform third-tier upgrades for Level 5-7 creatures of the Dragon Kingdom.
hero.dragonutopiaks-town.dragoneadrian.b: Little is known about this hero.
hero.dragonutopiaks-town.dragoneadrian.s: The hero's Earth magic damage is increased by 30%. Increases the maximum HP of the hero's units by 5%, plus an additional 1 point.
hero.dragonutopiaks-town.dragonedalia.bi: Little is known about this hero.
hero.dragonutopiaks-town.dragonedalia.sp: Reduces enemy magic resistance by 10% and gains a 5% bonus to Resistance per level.
hero.dragonutopiaks-town.dragonedecken.b: Little is known about this hero.
hero.dragonutopiaks-town.dragonedecken.s: The hero receives a 5% bonus to Defense skill per level.
Little is known about this hero.
Hero's movement on land and sea is increased by 150. Can safely pass through whirlpools. Creatures in the army gain +1 Speed.
hero.dragonutopiaks-town.dragonehilika.b: Little is known about this hero.
hero.dragonutopiaks-town.dragonehilika.s: Dragon-type creatures in the army take 10% less ranged damage. Reduces mana cost by 2 when casting (minimum 1).
hero.dragonutopiaks-town.dragoneiser.bio: Little is known about this hero.
hero.dragonutopiaks-town.dragoneiser.spe: The hero's Air magic damage is increased by 30%. Dragon-type creatures in the army gain +1 Speed.
hero.dragonutopiaks-town.dragonejacquena: Little is known about this hero.
The hero starts with all Fire magic from the original game.
hero.dragonutopiaks-town.dragonejoseph.b: Little is known about this hero.
hero.dragonutopiaks-town.dragonejoseph.s: The hero's Fire magic damage is increased by 30%. All dragon-type creatures in the army gain +1 Morale.
hero.dragonutopiaks-town.dragonemadan.bi: Little is known about this hero.
hero.dragonutopiaks-town.dragonemadan.sp: Receives a 5% bonus to Offense skill per level.
hero.dragonutopiaks-town.dragonemarcus.b: Little is known about this hero.
hero.dragonutopiaks-town.dragonemarcus.s: Reduces enemy Morale by 1 and increases enemy mana cost by 2.
hero.dragonutopiaks-town.dragonerogue.bi: Little is known about this hero.
hero.dragonutopiaks-town.dragonerogue.sp: Receives a 5% bonus to Intelligence skill per level. Hero gains 5 mana regeneration per day.
hero.dragonutopiaks-town.dragonesean.bio: Little is known about this hero.
hero.dragonutopiaks-town.dragonesean.spe: Provides 200 gold extra per day. Receives a 5% bonus to Learning skill per level.
hero.dragonutopiaks-town.dragonesuleiman: Little is known about this hero.
Dragon-type creatures in the army gain +2 Attack and Defense, and +1 Morale.
hero.dragonutopiaks-town.dragonetimur.bi: Little is known about this hero.
hero.dragonutopiaks-town.dragonetimur.sp: Dragon-type creatures in the army gain +5% HP, are immune to mind magic, and are immune to fear.
hero.dragonutopiaks-town.dragoneuncleiva: Little is known about this hero.
The hero's Water magic damage is increased by 30%. Reduces mana cost by 2 when casting (minimum 1).
hero.dragonutopiaks-town.dragonexerxes.b: Little is known about this hero.
hero.dragonutopiaks-town.dragonexerxes.s: Reduces enemy hero Power by 10%. Hero gains 5 mana regeneration per day.
skill.dragonutopiaks-town.dragonPower.de:
{Advanced Dragon Power}

Advanced Dragon Power increases Attack and Defense of dragons in your army by +3 and Speed by +1. If the hero also has Expert Dragon Power and Expert Dragon Resistance, all troops are treated as dragons.

{Basic Dragon Power}

Basic Dragon Power increases Attack and Defense of dragons in your army by +2. If the hero also has Expert Dragon Power and Expert Dragon Resistance, all troops are treated as dragons.

{Expert Dragon Power}

Expert Dragon Power increases Attack and Defense of dragons in your army by +5 and Speed by +2. If the hero also has Expert Dragon Power and Expert Dragon Resistance, all troops are treated as dragons.
skill.dragonutopiaks-town.dragonResist.d:
{Advanced Dragon Resistance}

Advanced Dragon Resistance makes dragons in your army immune to level 1-3 spells. If the hero also has Expert Dragon Power and Expert Dragon Resistance, all troops are treated as dragons.

{Basic Dragon Resistance}

Basic Dragon Resistance makes dragons in your army immune to level 1-2 spells. If the hero also has Expert Dragon Power and Expert Dragon Resistance, all troops are treated as dragons.

{Expert Dragon Resistance}

Expert Dragon Resistance makes dragons in your army immune to level 1-4 spells. If the hero also has Expert Dragon Power and Expert Dragon Resistance, all troops are treated as dragons.
